title: Looking for shoutcasters!
body: I'm currently in search of two shoutcasters for tournament I plan on holding this coming Thursday. If you're interested, add me on League Client.

replies.body: I added you in-game. I'm an amateur caster looking for tourney experience and I think we could help each other out. I leave the client on even when I'm afk so feel free to message me any time and I'll get back to you. Examples of soloQ casts I've done can be found at this youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbMxedc-jrp6NbMetAH0MUSRNbiukxr-_
